Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back 2 FREE NIGHTS View gallery / Back Silkari Lagoons Pool 2 Silkari Lagoons Pool Tropical North Queensland Silkari Lagoons Port Douglas &vert; Return flights • 8 nights Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Silkari Lagoon Resort Port Douglas is the ultimate tropical getaway, perfectly located in one of Australia's most sought-after destinations. With its stunning lagoon-style pool, swim-up bar, and poolside cabanas, you'll feel like you've been transported to your own private oasis. Location is unbeatable, just a short stroll from Four Mile Beach and the vibrant heart of Port Douglas. Whether you're seeking relaxation or adventure, Silikari Lagoon Resort has got you covered. View more View less 8 nights + flights from $ 1229 per person share twin Flying with Jetstar 2 FREE NIGHTS Enquire now Sale Period : until 17 Nov 25 by 4pm or until sold out Deal includes: Return Economy class airfares flying Jetstar from Christchurch to Cairns (includes 20kg checked bag & seat selection (subject to availability), per person) 8 nights accommodation 2 FREE night FREE Wi-Fi Weekly service A tranquil retreat with modern and stylish apartments surrounded by lush tropical gardens, making it the perfect escape for relaxation and rejuvenation. With six stunning lagoon-style swimming pools, you can enjoy a refreshing dip, relax under the sun, or swim right up to your private accommodation. Ideally located near the famous Four Mile Beach, boutique shops, and exquisite restaurants, and just 5 minutes drive to the Macrossan Street, it’s a fantastic base to explore the Great Barrier Reef, Daintree Rainforest, and other local attractions. Room Types Departs From Christchurch from Auckland Hotel Balcony Spa Room 1 x king split bed Christchurch 8 night package from $1229 per person share twin Additional night from $89 per person share twin Departs Christchurch Mondays, Wednesday & Fridays, returns from Cairns Tuesdays, Thursdays & Sundays Travel 28 Jan - 31 Mar 26 Christchurch 8 night package from $1249 per person share twin Additional night from $89 per person share twin Departs Christchurch Mondays, Wednesday & Fridays, returns from Cairns Tuesdays, Thursdays & Sundays Travel 04 May - 28 May 26 Port Douglas sightseeing optional add-ons Full-Day Small-Group Guided Snorkelling Tour, Outer Reef Travelers who love nature and wildlife will enjoy this snorkelling tour of the outer Great Barrier Reef. As well as being with a small group (maximum 12), you’ll get one instructor for every 6 participants, ensuring personalized service. Spend a full day out at some of the more remote snorkelling spots, away from the crowds. Be amazed by the variety of sea life you’ll see. Includes: Tea, coffee Fully guided tours by our expert snorkel guides | marine experts Premium 5mm wetsuits in winter Lunch Quality snorkelling equipment including Prescription masks Flotation devices & life jackets Full length Lycra-suits in summer Water (we suggest bringing a water bottle) which we can re fill on board Operates: Daily (except public holidays) Departs: 8.00am Duration: 7 hours Price from $739 per adult (7yrs +) Quicksilver Outer Reef Cruise including transfers For your experience of a lifetime, Quicksilver’s wavepiercing catamaran and friendly crew will take you to a reef at the very edge of Australia’s Continental Shelf, to an underwater world that is a dazzling kaleidoscope of colour and brilliance. Agincourt Reef, a magnificent ribbon reef where you can experience first hand the magic that is the Great Barrier Reef. Choose to dive, snorkel, or stay dry and explore the stunning reef from the comfort of a Quicksilver semi-sub, just one meter underwater. Watch the fish feeding from Quicksilver’s unique underwater viewing platform and underwater observatory, or add on a helicopter flight over the reef. Whichever way you choose, you’ll bring home a lifetime of memories from this living natural wonder. Includes: • Return hotel transfers • Morning and afternoon teas on board • Reef presentation by marine biologist • Hot and cold tropical smorgasbord lunch • All snorkelling equipment provided • Stinger/Lycra Suits & Bouyancy Aids provided • Return Wavepiercer cruise from Port Douglas • Qualified lifeguard supervision • Underwater observatory fish & coral viewing • Coral viewing by semi-submersible vessels • Fish feeding [conducted by crew] Operates: Daily (except Christmas Day) Opening hours: Cruise departs from the Marina at 10:00am. Duration: 5.5 hours (plus transfers) Price from: $399 per adult, $210 per child (4-14 years) River Drift Experience If you love nature and the water, then this is the perfect tour for you! Beginning with an interpretive river walk, where the shallow or dry riverbed serves as your path upstream, completely enveloped by the rainforest. This unique journey allows you to explore the river's course on foot, surrounded by rainforest, before transitioning to a different section of the river for the next phase of your adventure. Here, equipped with river sleds, you'll experience the varied pace of the river's flow. Glide through calm waters under a lush canopy, then feel the exhilaration of navigating faster currents Includes: • Return transfers ex Port Douglas and Mossman • free tour photos • rash vest/wetsuit • boots • snorkel mask (if suitable) • river sled • all safety equipment • experienced river guide • snacks Operates: Daily except Christmas Day Departure Time: Morning tour - 9:00am Port Douglas, 9:20am Mossman. Afternoon tour: 2:00pm Port Douglas, 2:20pm Mossman. Duration: up to 2 hours in rainforest, 3.5 hours return ex Port Douglas Price from: $165 per adult, $125 per child (4-15 years) Mossman Gorge Adventure Day Immerse yourself in a rainforest experience like no other! Beginning the day at a secret location on the Mossman River for our one of a kind River Drift Experience; with a guided river walk upstream, enjoy the varied pace downstream on a river sled. After a well earned lunch, enjoy a traditional Kuku Yalanji smoking ceremony at the Mossman Gorge; you’ll be cleansed of bad spirits and have traditional rainforest body paint applied. Exploring the Daintree National Park at an easy pace, this interpretive 1.5hr walk, will leave you with a deeper understanding of this breath-taking rainforest.. A Daintree adventure not to be missed! Includes: Return Transfers ex Port Douglas & Mossman River Drift Experience Tour Mossman Gorge welcome ceremony Lunch and snacks BPA-Free water bottle to use during the tour Free tour photos All safety equipment Experienced river guide Operates: Daily (except public holidays) Duration: 8-10 hours Departs: 8.30am from Port Douglas Price from $309 per adult, $259 per child (5-15 years) Please note transfers are not included from Cairns or Palm Cove, you must make your own way to the meeting point in Port Douglas. Daintree, Cape Tribulation & Bloomfield Track: Full Day Tour Head out on a rainforest adventure on the original Daintree Rainforest Tour. Take a guided walk through the ancient Daintree Rainforest and along the flawless white beaches of Cape Tribulation with your guide. Then, hop aboard a river cruise and listen to commentary about the local wildlife as you try to spot crocodiles. Then, take a freshwater swim in the heart of the rainforest and enjoy a homegrown tropical fruit ice cream. Includes: Guided walk through the Daintree Rainforest Swim in the heart of the Daintree Rainforest National Park fees Free-time stroll along Cape Tribulation Beach Lunch 1 Hour Daintree River Cruise with coffee, tea and biscuits before cruise Return transfers with driver guide and live commentary Daintree Ice-creamery (ice-cream included) Operates: Daily (except public holidays) Departs: 7.00am Duration: approx. 8 hours (plus transfers) Price from: $275 per adult, $205 per child (4-16 years) Barramundi Fishing Experience: Self Drive Head out on a classic Queenslander fishing trip to catch your own Barramundi. On this 1 hour fishing trip, you will explore the tropical location of the Daintree Saltwater Barramundi Farm, and learn how to catch a fish that’s a favourite and famous local cuisine. At Hook-A-Barra you can also learn about the fish and its behaviour in special viewing tanks, so if you’re not into fishing, you can still see Barramundi up close. Includes: Fishing rod, tackle, lures and/or bait Operates: Daily except Sundays & Public Holidays Departs: 9.00am Duration: 1 hour Price from $79 per adult, $69 per child (5-14 years) Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings only from 09-17 Nov 25 or until sold out • Prices are correct as at 04 Nov 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation • Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability • Price is based on the most direct routing but may vary depending on subsequent tax and surcharge increases • Full payment is required at time of booking • All travel must be commenced and completed as specified • Some surcharges, closeouts, flight, routing and accommodation restrictions apply • Packages are subject to availability • Package prices are based on return Economy class airfares flying Jetstar from Christchurch to Cairns.• Jetstar flight departures from Christchurch to Cairns depart on Monday, Wednesday & Friday and from Cairns to Christchurch on Tuesday, Thursday & Sunday. • Economy class fares include 20kg checked bag and seat selection (subject to availability), per person • Flights are restricted to selected day of the week schedules • Day of the week surcharges may apply • Min/max stays apply • Share twin is based on 2 adults sharing a room, bedding configurations may vary • If additional accommodation is required due to flight schedules this is at customers own expense • Any hotel credits that are unused are not refundable, transferable and cannot be exchanged for cash • Advertised prices are per person based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • Airfares are non-refundable, non-transferable and name changes are not permitted • Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property • Packages are subject to availability • Product is supplied by reputable suppliers with their own terms and conditions • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details. Sightseeing conditions: Prices are valid as at 07 Oct 25, but may vary depending on exchange rates. The price guide shown is a per person from price and is based on low season travel. Travel must be completed by 31 Mar 26 unless otherwise stated, closeout dates may apply. Min/max numbers may apply for tours to operate. Fuel surcharges may be applied without notice payable direct. Tours and sightseeing are subject to change and additional transfers may be required to connect with tours – these will be an additional cost, please ask your House of Travel consultant.
